name: MTÜ Sotsiaalsete Ettevõtete Võrgustik (Estonian Social Enterprise Network)
membership: We are a member of the Network of Estonian Nonprofit Organizations. The list of members: http://heakodanik.ee/emsli-liikmete-nimekiri/
memberOrga: The list of member organizations of Estonian Social Enterprise Network: https://sev.ee/meie-liikmed/
goal: The Estonian Social Enterprise Network´s strategic objectives are concerned with increasing the number, capacity and impact of social enterprises in Estonia. We are both a membership-based association and an advocacy think tank. Currently, we have 51 of the top Estonian social enterprises as our members, with the number of members is growing steadily. As an advocate representing the social enterprise sector, we have become an officially recognized partner for the Ministries of Interior, Social Affairs, and Finance.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Regional Policy, Taxation
euInitiatives:
1) Social Business Initiative and its sub-initiatives.
2) Public Procurement Reform, including implementation of the Directives.
